titleStmt.title: A handful of essaies. Or Imperfect offers: by W: Mason Master of Arts
titleStmt.author: Mason, William, M.A.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathewes for Iohn Grismand, are are to bee sold in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A handfull of essaies.
The last four leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne
